ygData.subject: RE: Help I look like a Nazi
ygData.msgSnippet: hoods are easy to get (level 40+ group of course) and far outnumber turbins. yes they are more expensive, and have great stats, but still look like leather.
ygData.messageBody:
hoods are easy to get (level 40+ group of course) and far outnumber turbins.
yes they are more expensive, and have great stats, but still look like
leather. therefore i still wear my turbin heh.

Shada D'ukal, Level 50 Wood Elf Bard
Erisi Dlarit, Level 22 High Elf Paladin
Tyria, Level 10 High Elf Wizard
Mithaniel Marr Server


>
> From: "Kyle" <ksibbald@...>
>
> Err... No. Hoods are both more expensive and much
> harder to get. They may
> be *faster* to get, but much harder. Turbins ran for about
> 400 plat on Cazic
> a week ago and I *think* hoods were around the 800 mark.
>
> Good Journey,
>
> Sineras Silverlyre (Cazic-Thule)
>
>
